dimensional.name: Intersection of front facade and underside or bottom of 2nd floor

material.name: Outside material of the entry-way feature

usage.name: Gross floor area
usage.calculation: Area counts three times if 2nd floor over a vaulted entry

mandatory: The area is measured to the outside material of the entry-way feature.

conditional_logic.condition: If the entryway is considered to be a vaulted entryway
conditional_logic.outcome: The area counts TWICE toward gross floor area.

special_cases: A portion of the entryway is recessed beyond the house facade and roof. It is included in the area that counts.

logical_dependencies: The area will count three times toward gross floor area if the 2nd floor is over a vaulted entry.
